Bridges: Construction - Concrete (Superstructure) - with Cast-in-Place Piles
Bridges: Construction - Concrete (Superstructure) - with Driven Piles
Bridges: Construction - Steel (Superstructure) - with Cast-in-Place Piles
Bridges: Construction - Steel (Superstructure) - with Driven Piles
Bridges: Rehabilitation - Concrete (Superstructure) - with Cast-in-Place Piles
Buildings: Construction - with Piles - Low Rise - Concrete (Frame) - Cast-in-Place Piles (1 to 5 Storeys)
Buildings: Construction - with Piles - Low Rise - Concrete (Frame) - Driven Piles (1 to 5 Storeys)
Buildings: Construction - with Piles - Medium Rise - Concrete (Frame) - Cast-in-Place Piles (6 to 15 Storeys)
Buildings: Construction - without Piles - Low Rise - Concrete (Frame) (1 to 5 Storeys)
Buildings: Construction - without Piles - Low Rise - Steel (Frame) (1 to 5 Storeys)
Buildings: Retrofitting - Low Rise (1 to 5 Storeys)
Electrical Work: Construction - Road Safety System (e.g. Solar LED  Street Lights, Solar Studs, Signalization)
Flood Control: Construction - Bank Protection Structure
Flood Control: Construction - Drainage (e.g., Closed and Open Conduits, Spillway)
Flood Control: Construction - Shore Protection (e.g., Seawall, Breakwater)
Flood Control: Construction - Slope Protection using Structural Measures (e.g., Revetment, Retaining Structures, Rock Netting, Concrete Crib, Shotcrete, MSE Walls, Gabions, Riprap, Masonry)
Ports/Harbors: Construction - Causeway/Wharf - with Driven Piles
Road: Construction - Road Safety System (e.g. Roadway Delineation, Roadside Barrier System, Signages, Active Transport Facilities)
Roads: Construction - Drainage (e.g. Reinforced Concrete Pipe Culvert, Reinforced Concrete Box Culvert)
Roads: Construction - Slope Protection using Structural Measures (e.g. Revetment, Retaining Structures, Rock Netting, Concrete Crib, Shotcrete, MSE Walls, Gabions, Riprap, Masonry)
Water Supply (Level 2 & 3): Construction (Piped Water with Communal/Private Water Point)
Water Supply (Level 2): Construction (Piped Water with Communal/Solar-powered Water System)
Water Supply (Level 3): Construction (Private Water Point/Solar-powered Water System)
